member.name: T:Wpf.Scopes.Enums.ScopeCategoryV2
member.summary:
Defines scope categories with hierarchical relationships using flags.
The flags enable implicit fallback behavior: - Services registered for Region can be resolved from Window/Dialog scopes - Services registered for Database can be resolved from Transaction scopes - Services registered for Request can be resolved from Worker/Workflow scopes
Hierarchy rules (parent can satisfy child): - UIContainer (Window|Dialog) → can satisfy → Region - Transaction → can satisfy → Database - ProcessingScope (Worker|Workflow) → can satisfy → Request - Worker → can satisfy → Batch

member.name: T:Wpf.Scopes.Services.SharedServiceProxy`1
member.summary:
A high-performance dynamic proxy that wraps a shared service instance. It forwards all method calls to the target instance EXCEPT for the Dispose() method. This prevents the Microsoft Dependency Injection container from disposing instances that are owned by a parent scope (ScopeStore) but injected into a child scope.
Uses Expression Trees and cached delegates for near-native performance.
